full_text.0:
It all starts Monday for The World Cup! Excited to start I’d off with this @cmpulisic Prizm Landmark. 

#ElMundial #Landmark #PaniniAmerica #Prizm #Pulisic #USA #LetsGo #FIFA @ Chandler, Arizona https://t.co/mYB4UaWYzi
full_text.1: ESPN FC called Craig Burley the "Scottish Christian Pulisic" and I almost died... https://t.co/v6AkMUCUy0
full_text.3: @ChelseaFCSkye @Crossroads_CFC The real question is... how do we blame Pulisic or Sarri?
full_text.4: @JordanBrenner We just never play well when Aaronson starts on the wing. If we're playing Berhalter's system, I think Weah has to start. If I get to pick my system, I think Reyna/Pulisic/Aaronson are close to interchangeable. Reyna/Pulisic better at 10 than Aaronson, but he CAN play there.
full_text.5:
@JordanBrenner Right now I think McKennie. Injury + form dip. In a 4-4-2, I'd go:

Sargent-Pepi
Reyna
Pulisic - Musah
Adams
Jedi - Ream - Zimmerman (or CCV) - Dest
full_text.6:
@JordanBrenner I think it's going to be standard, though.

Ferriera
Pulisic/Weah
McKennie
Musah
Adams
Jedi/Long/Zimmerman/Dest
full_text.7: @JordanBrenner We know they SHOULD get out. I think Aaronson and Reyna start on the bench simply because Berhalter’s system only works if Weah and Pulisic are the wingers. He relies on their speed so much. The offense without Weah has been nonexistent.
full_text.8: Ending of that new castle game is great haha Ref freaking shoved Pulisic
full_text.9: lol I swear if Pulisic actually got hurt in the 98th minute
full_text.10: NBC commentators wanking over Pulisic coming off the bench
full_text.11: Throw on Kai and Pulisic at the 65th minute if we still look like this... no idea if it will help...
full_text.12: @hunterparker99 @usmntonly Lol Aaron with that assist matched Pulisic in goal contribution the season but took a million more minutes to do it. Pulisic is in good form. It ain’t happening
full_text.13: @masteryodaiv @Beetlep95923146 @usmntonly @NBCSportsSoccer Pulisic is in fantastic form right now, have you not watched?
full_text.14: @masteryodaiv @usmntonly @NBCSportsSoccer Lol Aaron JUST matched Pulisic’s goal contributions so far this season. 😂 he’s played like a million more minutes
full_text.15:
Pulisic, Havertz, Sterling and even Aubameyang would most likely miss this goal Ivan Toney scored to win the game for Brentford.

That's how disastrous and catastrophic Chelsea front has been this season that has led Newcastle to be +17 GD to Chelsea's +1 GD.
full_text.17:
@goatwaa @DanielSmith1022 There are at least 6 other guys who can play RW and be just as effective as Morris (while also being able to play either MF or CF). Makes Morris obsolete.

W/MF

Pulisic/Reyna/Aaronson/Musah/Roldan (even tho yuck)

W/CF:

Sargent
full_text.18:
@AnarchoMayo @ManagerTactical You don’t need to change it = the point. Guys who are interchangeable at W/MF:

Pulisic
Reyna
Aaronson
Musah
Roldan (although, bleh)

Interchangeable W/CF:

Sargent

Not every side has this luxury. We didn’t need Morris. We may need another in-form goal scorer.
full_text.19: @goobysnack1 @Ceruti @MaxBretosSports System needs Musah + Weah/Pulisic to work AT ALL. Aaronson is a super sub or a replacement for Weston. The system doesn’t work otherwise - at least if you’re trying to actually score. Now if you’re trying to close a match out with a lead, sure. But that sure ain’t the beginning.
full_text.20: @Ceruti @MaxBretosSports You can spin it however you want, but it is 100% accurate. Brought a non-versatile, non-value add winger when Aaronson, Pulisic, and Musah can play both on the wing and in the midfield. This would be controversial even if Pepi WASN’T in incredible form right now.
full_text.21: I cannot wait to watch Tim Weah, Christian Pulisic, Matt Turner, Weston McKennie and the new wave of USMNT. IMO this US mens team has the most potential I’ve seen by far. Tons of speed. Who needs a true 9 when you have dynamic ball handling/ striking forwards like CP and Weah
full_text.22:
Given the roster, here's what I would like to see as the starting lineup in the World Cup:
GK - Sean Johnson
Backs - Dest, Robinson, Zimmerman, Carter-Vickers
MF - Acosta, Adams, Musah, McKennie
Fwds - Pulisic, Reyna
However, looking at the roster, tough to get out of the group
full_text.23: Ferreira, JoMo, Pulisic, Reyna, Sargent, Weah, Wright...No Pepi on the Roster
full_text.24: Graham Potter is not the problem. The Chelsea team has no bite and wits. The whole attacking front has got no goals in them one bit. Chances other team's front players get and make something off it, these lads waste them. Sterling, Havertz, Pulisic, Broja, Auba,etc offers nothing
full_text.25: Christian Pulisic playing 94 minutes of a meaningless Carabao Cup game right before the World Cup and not getting injured https://t.co/SLZsmMaFAJ
full_text.26: The one time Potter plays Pulisic a full 90, it's right before the World Cup lol
full_text.27:
If I were picking the #USMNT roster: 

Pulisic, Pepi, Weah, Aaronson, Arriola, Ferreira, Sargent, Morris

Adams, Musah, Reyna, McKennie, Acosta, Roldan, Mihailovic

Jedi, Long, Zimmerman, Dest, Yedlin, Scally, Carter-Vickers, Ream

Turner, Horvath, Johnson
